document_data.name: Mother Millstone
document_data.mainbody: '''Mother Millstone''' was the highest-ranking priest of the [[Faceless God]] among the vile [[yak-folk]] of the [[World Pillar Mountains]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}{{Cite dragon/241/Campaign Classics: The Roof of the World}}
document_data.Activities: Mother Millstone oversaw the largest temple dedicated to the Faceless God. She was also the appointed governor of the [[Yak's Horn]] province and a member of the [[Seven Sages]]. Her territory overlapped into the fringes of the [[Haunted Lands]], granting her access to a wide array of strange creatures.
document_data.Rumors & Legends: It was rumored that Mother Millstone found a way to harness the bizarre spirits of the desert in the lowlands of the Haunted Lands bordering the World Pillar Mountains.
